other_tests.findings: Unable to cannulate the CBD; stented the pancreatic duct.
Bilateral atelectasis and free fluid in the gallbladder fossa and in the right paracolic gutter.

Low lung volumes; improved ventilation at the lung bases; unchanged position of the right central venous access line; unchanged moderate cardiomegaly; unchanged plate-like atelectasis at the left lung apex.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved ventilation at the lung bases.
